attributes.action: Impose Sanctions against the Israeli Government and Army
attributes.additional_details:
How can this Government stand-by and do nothing against the Israeli agression and systematic distruction of Palestinian land and its people?

Why is nothing being said or done to condemn Israel?
This government is quick to impose these sanctions against Iran and other None-European centred countries. Now it is time to look at the truth and face facts. Many war crimes are being committed here.

What do I want you to do:

Condemn the Israelis Army and its Government
Impose Sanctions on all arms sales and military support for Israel
Stop all financial aid for Israel
Freeze all Bank accounts of the Israel Government in this country (like you did for the Lybian government)

This will make a start for promoting world peace. Do you have the strength to stand up to them?
